summary: replaces the decapitation gore texture, for both body and head.
descriptionHtml:
(uploading user image is *not* allowed here)

\"blood orange decap\" replaces the decapitation gore texture, for both body and head.

uninstallation, manually delete the following files:
\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\gore\\
neckgorecap.dds
neckgorecap_n.dds

credit:
blood orange scanned by Scannables (scannables.net)

thank you, and happy modding.
